title: Scented jasmine rice

default: 350g/12oz jasmine rice, rinsed until the water runs clear
1 small handful fresh coriander, roughly chopped

steps: Place the rice into a heavy-based saucepan and add the boiling water. Bring to the boil, then cover with a tight-fitting lid and reduce to a low heat. Simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until all of the liquid has been absorbed and the rice is cooked al dente.
Uncover the pan and remove from the heat. Fluff up the rice grains with a fork, stir in the remaining ingredients and serve immediately.
